data.name: In The Black
data.detailed_description:
Nuclear-Powered Multiplayer Space Combat

At its core In The Black ™ is an intense multiplayer team-based online space combat simulator with a laser-like focus on the combat and a serious respect for science. This earned the Atomic Rocket's Seal of Approval.

Set in our own solar system 200 years in the future, players are private military contractors (mercenaries) hired by the megacorporations to fight their covert wars for control of the system’s resources.

The Impeller Studios team is led by industry veterans Jack Mamais (MechWarrior 2: Mercenaries, Far Cry, and Crysis) and David Wessman (the X-Wing / TIE Fighter series, Blood Wake, and Saints Row).

We're all hardcore gamers ourselves. We believe games should be skill-based and intrinsically rewarding. And we really like the idea of flying nuclear-powered rockets through the rings of Saturn to engage in explosive high tech mayhem!

If you share our enthusiasm, please Add to your wishlist!

data.short_description: Nuclear-powered space combat in the 23rd century! In The Black ™ is an intense multiplayer team-based online space combat simulator with a laser-like focus on combat and a serious respect for science. Features single-player and online co-op modes, and robust customization options.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

movies.name: In The Black Name Announcement Super Teaser

content_descriptors.notes:
Intense Violence - Graphic and realistic-looking physics-based depictions of space combat involving guns, missiles and lasers. Pilots may be killed, but this is never shown.
Language - Mild to moderate use of profanity
